answers: Trump has proposed eliminating the individual income tax

correct.text: Trump’s tax plan would collapse the current seven brackets, which range from 10 percent to 39.6 percent, into three brackets: 12, 25, and 33 percent. Trump would use the same tax brackets as outlined in Speaker Ryan and the House Republican’s tax proposal.

questions.prompt: Donald Trump has proposed lowering the top individual income tax rate from 39.6 percent to what rate?
